comments.author: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
comments.creator: iannbugzilla@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
If you create a text editor window from Composer Debug menu, it has the correct editortype (text) but the incorrect contentsMIMEType (text/html).
This causes a problem when you try and save a document as it thinks it is saving an HTML document.
Notice by Neil in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=645581#c1
comments.text:
If you create a text editor window from Composer Debug menu, it has the correct editortype (text) but the incorrect contentsMIMEType (text/html).
This causes a problem when you try and save a document as it thinks it is saving an HTML document.
Notice by Neil in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=645581#c1
